hero.title: A Simple Bookmark Manager
hero.description: A clean and simple interface to organize your favourite websites. Open a new browser tab and see your sites load instantly. Try it for free.

features.title: Features
features.description: Our aim is to make it quick and easy for you to access your favourite websites. Your bookmarks sync between your devices so you can access them on the go.

items.head: Simple Bookmarking
items.title: Bookmark in one click
items.description: Organize your bookmarks however you like. Our simple drag-and-drop interface gives you complete control over how you manage your favourite sites.

items.head: Speedy Searching
items.title: Intelligent search
items.description: Our powerful search feature will help you find saved sites in no time at all.  No need to trawl through all of your bookmarks.

items.head: Easy Sharing
items.title: Share your bookmarks
items.description: Easily share your bookmarks and collections with others. Create a shareable link that you can send at the click of a button.

extension.title: Download the extension
extension.description: We’ve got more browsers in the pipeline. Please do let us know if you’ve got a favourite you’d like us to prioritize.

FAQS.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQS.description: Here are some of our FAQs. If you have any other questions you’d like answered please feel free to email us.
